document_data.caption: A map showing Al-Tarik Islands in the Golden Gulf.
document_data.name: Al-Qirmiza Islands
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Qirmiza Islands''' was a large archipelago found in the [[Crowded Sea]] within [[west Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography:
Al-Qirmiza Islands were located {{SI|210|mi|k|long=yes}} due south of [[Gana]] on the mainland. The archipelago was one of several clusters of island in the area including both [[Al-Tarik Islands]] and [[Al-Zulm Islands]].

Sixteen individual islands were part of the archipelago. The only named island was also the largest by farâ€“[[Dabab Island]].
